languages.text: Пощадил{mf||а} мятежника Арильда, ослеплявшего людей еретической линзой.
Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.
languages.original_text: Пощадил{mf||а} мятежника Арильда, ослеплявшего людей еретической линзой.

traits.locale_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.
Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.
Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.
Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

languages.text: 你放过了使用异端透镜烧人眼睛的叛乱分子艾瑞德。
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: 你放过了使用异端透镜烧人眼睛的叛乱分子艾瑞德。

languages.text: Has dejado ir al rebelde Aryld, que cegaba a la gente con una lente especial.
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: Has dejado ir al rebelde Aryld, que cegaba a la gente con una lente especial.

languages.text: 異端のレンズで人々を盲目にした反逆者アリルドを生かすことにした。
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: 異端のレンズで人々を盲目にした反逆者アリルドを助命した。

languages.text: Vous avez épargné Aryld qui se servait d'une lentille hérétique pour aveugler les gens.
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: Vous avez épargné Aryld qui se servait d'une lentille hérétique pour aveugler les gens.

languages.text: Den Rebellen Aryld verschont, der mit einer ketzerischen Linse andere geblendet hat.
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: Den Rebellen Aryld verschont, der mit einer ketzerischen Linse andere geblendet hat.

languages.text: Kâfirce bir lensle insanları kör eden isyancı Aryld'in canını bağışladın.
languages.original_text: Spared the rebel Aryld who blinded people with a heretical lens.

traits.locale_text: Kâfirce bir lensle insanları kör eden isyancı Aryld'in canını bağışladın.
